name: Among Ass (itch) (JakeDgames)
description:
Among Ass is a visual novel, made with the Ren'Py engine.

It is a parody based on Among Us and you will better understand the plot and get more pleasure from the game if you are familiar with this game.

9 crew members traveling through space and 1 impostor trying to take over the ship.(this plot can change along the way with your coments)

Who is the impostor? Is there only one?
